title: Spline Adaptive Filtering and Robust Learning Techniques for Nonlinear System Identification

context.prior_knowledge: Linear systems theory, basic statistics, and programming experience with MATLAB/Python
context.additional_context: Learners explore modeling techniques for solving nonlinear system problems in real industrial settings through project-based learning, developing data processing and algorithm implementation skills in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical modeling of nonlinear systems and adaptive filtering techniques based on splines.
Learners can implement algorithms applying the robust LHC cost function and MNAG learning method in impulsive noise environments.
Learners can perform performance evaluations of the SAF-LHC-MNAG algorithm using real-world nonlinear hysteresis system data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
